title: No trace of my device which was send to service factory. Google support team just asking to wait
content:
What to do if not getting proper support from Google Support team
As per service factory status 'device is on it's way' from last 4 days.
With initial tracking ID of logistic it is delivered some where. But not to me.
Since yesterday I am contacting support team. They are just apologizing, escalating case some where and asking wait.
What should I do in this case?
